about.title: Mid Front-end Developer
about.description:
A young specialist with eyes full of passion. I code in TypeScript / Next. Over 3 years of total commercial experience.
Currently living in Saint Petersburg. I've worked solo as well as in large developer teams, done freelance work, and helped beginners enter development from scratch. I love watching movies and series, playing games, and recently started learning electric guitar and leading a healthy lifestyle!
